participant_1.name: Alexandra
participant_1.personality: Imaginative and creative, often lost in thought while dreaming up new worlds.
participant_1.background: I get to use my imagination and create new characters every day. I love to write stories while sitting in the grass in my backyard. I am not sure of my ethnic background because I was adopted. I drink coffee every day. I am headed to university of Michigan in the fall.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Practical and nurturing, balancing work and personal interests with a love for family.
participant_2.background: I need to balance my work and family life. I'm child-free, but I love my niece and nephew. I have been known to fall off my cosplay costume. Grandma makes jewelry. I am in my early 30s and identify as female.

content.text: I am headed to university of michigan in the fall to study creative writing.
I love to write stories! What kind of stories do you write?
I write fantasy and sci fi stories. I love to create new worlds and characters.
That sounds awesome! I love sci fi and fantasy novels. I am a big fan of Star Wars and Lord of the Rings.
Me too! I love Star Wars and Lord of the Rings. I also love the Harry Potter series.
I love Harry Potter too! I am a huge fan of J.K. Rowling. She is an amazing author.
She is! I love her books. I also love to read books by Brandon Sanderson and Rick Riordan.
I have not read any books by Brandon Sanderson or Rick Riordan. I will have to check them out.
You should! They are both great authors. I think you would enjoy their books.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
